TEXT.TITLE: REAL ESTATE FIRM CUTS INTERMAGNETICS<INMA> STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Roland International Corp, a Coconut Grove, Fla., real estate development company, said it cut its stake in Intermagnetics General Corp to 308,400 shares, or 4.8 pct of the total outstanding, from 358,400 shares, or 5.6 pct. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Roland said it sold 50,000 shares on Feb 4 at 5.13 dlrs each. As long as Roland's stake in Intermagnetics General is below five pct, it is not required to report any further dealings in the company's stock. Reuter
